attributes.action: Get accident prevention actions on A41 Berkhamsted and Tring Bypass
attributes.background: Accident prevention,speed reductions at junctions,speed signag and accident information

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This section of road is not the responsibility of Highways England, but the local council.

You can find out how to petition Hertfordshire Council here:

https://democracy.hertfordshire.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
